archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.4.9a: a) limiting access to business applications on the corporate network (e.g. by restricting access using a Virtual Private Network (VPN), firewalls and proxy servers)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
